comments.author: angela
comments.body:
fixed for inclusion in version 1.0

rev: 385540

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 1.0 branch in revision 385846.

description:
JCR specific dav-property ValuesProperty does not reveal the PropertyType of the value, which is therefore lost during (de)serialization. 

Solution: 
- Pass type of the JCR-value as attribute to the xml-element containing the value.
summary: Jcr-Server: ValuesProperty missing property type information
